Councils minimise IT cuts to drive through savings>> Computer Weekly Cuts to IT budgets in local councils have been minimised in an attempt by local authorities to drive efficiency savings through technology, according to the latest report from Socitm.`` Budgets made available for ICT functions declined by 2.6% in 2010 compare to the previous year, while borrowing to invest in ICT doubled. In 2009 budgets shrank by 11%. This year's figure was much less than expected, said the body for public sector IT professionals. But just http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''
